item.question:
chimera
[kaɪˈmɪrə]
item.answer:
【考法】 n. 虚构的事物，幻觉：an illusion or fabrication of the mind， especially an unrealizable dream
【例】 EU is just a chimera that can't prevent old nations from playing their dices. 欧盟只不过是一个虚构的存在，它根本不可能阻止那些老国家按照自己的一套规则办事。
【近】 conceit, daydream, delusion, fantasy, figment, hallucination, illusion, phantasm, vision
【反】 actuality, fact, reality, truth 事实，现实
